question: Which city has been chosen as the host for the negotiations of mega trade deal RCEP in July, 2017?
explanation: Regional Comprehensive Economic Partnership (RCEP) is a mega trade deal which aims at liberalising norms for trade in goods and services and boost investment among 16-member countries. The trade bloc consists of 10 ASEAN members (Brunei, Cambodia, Indonesia, Malaysia, Myanmar, Singapore, Thailand, the Philippines, Laos and Vietnam) and their six Free Trade Agreement (FTA) partners- India, China, Japan, South Korea, Australia and New Zealand. Hyderabad International Convention Centre is the proposed venue for the meet.
